text:
Thank you very much!
We're SHHis...!

Thank you.
I look forward to seeing you all again.
Motion

Oh, sorry.
Did I startled you?

No......!
Um, no, not at all ────
Motion
Soon, we'll be recording a new song.

......!
T-That's right...
Have you listened to it yet?

──That one demo track right?
Yes, I've listened to it...

It's a bright, pop song. It was a different
tune from what we've done before.

And, the lyrics... it's like... you know...
It's like an enjoyable conversation...
Right

─an enjoyable conversation...
I wonder how we should portray that.
Eh...

For now, we should nail the basic choreography, right?
─Well then, I'll be leaving soon
Motion
U-Um wait...!
Motion

W-Well, I, Um...
I'll be sure to master it properly...!

Yeah, let's work hard on the lessons
leading up to the recording.
S-Sure...!
Well then, thanks for your hard work.
